New Records: Daryl Mitchell scored the highest individual score in a World Cup semi-final with 134 runs
Mohammed Shami took three five-wicket hauls at the same World Cup
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 45 runs
Daryl Mitchell was caught by Rohit Sharma off Mohammed Siraj
Miscellaneous Highlights: India beat New Zealand by 70 runs to advance to the World Cup final
